db:article.db:para: This property was introduced in Qt 6.2.4.

db:note.db:para: This property is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This property is used only if targeting the WebAssembly platform.

db:article.db:para: Specifies the initial amount of memory to use, in bytes. Using more will cause the browser to copy the old heap into a new one. Translates into the Emscripten compiler setting of INITIAL_MEMORY. QT_WASM_INITIAL_MEMORY must be a multiple of 65536 bytes.
For more information, see Emscripten compiler settings.
